segments.text: I think the whole scene is just disgusting, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, the floor is getting ruined, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky and reckless, and it’s just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be a mess, and it’s all so preventable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing that plate like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, the water is pouring, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of scene that makes me want to look away because it’s just too much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in before it gets even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is just a disaster waiting to happen, and it’s making me sick.
segments.speaker: PAR
